ingredients: 1 recipe Easy Pie Dough, made with no sugar, with 1/2 of the fried shallots from the Green Bean Casserole recipe added to the food processor while processing flour and salt
1 recipe Ultimate Homemade Green Bean Casserole, completed through step 5, all ingredients allowed to cool at room temperature for at least 2 hours
Coarse sea salt, such as Maldon
